txt.en: Grants you an amount of Enhanced XP based on your level, doubling the xp that you gain from defeating enemies and completing quests. This increases character XP, Legendary Item XP, and Mounted combat XP. When using this item, enhanced XP is represented by the light blue area on your XP bar.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This item provides no benefit if you are at the level cap.</rgb>
